column1: #Text=Those in the know understood that Prime Minister Stephen Harper had instructed his finance minister, Jim Flaherty, to present a budget in February, 2014, that would make it look as if fiscal 2014-15 would end in a deficit of $2.9-billion.
#Text='Just who are those in the know?
#Text=Only a fool would turn this economy over to socialists like Justin or Mulcair
